Package controller

Class mainMenuController

java.lang.Object
controller.mainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class mainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Main Menu allows users to view all Customers and Appointments. User can add, update, or delete any customer or appointment. Appointment view can be altered to include all appointments, week view, or month view.

    • onCustomerDeleteBtn

      public void onCustomerDeleteBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Deletes selected customer from database and TableView. If no customer is selected, then an error pops up. If the customer still has associated appointments, an error pops up. Otherwise, a pop up details which customer was successfully deleted.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onApptAddBtn

    • onApptUpdateBtn

      public void onApptUpdateBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Directs user to Update Appointment scene. Error pops up if user has not selected an appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onApptDeleteBtn

      public void onApptDeleteBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Asks user to confirm that they way to delete this appointment. If so, deletes selected appointment. Error pops up if user had not selected an appointment. Confirmation message pops up after successful apointment deletion.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • onWeekViewBtn

      public void onWeekViewBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Appointments TableView only shows appointments occurring this week.

      actionEvent - Week View radio button is selected

      SQLException
